name: Command & Conquer - Red Alert Disc 2 Soviet [PSX]
description:
Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 is a strategy game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 26-10-2000. Electronic Arts published the game. Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 has a Metascore of 84, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 is available on PC.
Frank Klepacki scored the game.
